 31namespace vsip
 32{
 33namespace impl
 34{
 35
 36template <dimension_type> 
 37struct Freqswap_worker;
 38
 39/// Specialization for 1D swap
 40template <>
 41struct Freqswap_worker<1>
 42{
 43  template <typename ResultBlock, typename ArgumentBlock>
 44  static void apply(ResultBlock &out, ArgumentBlock const &in)
 45  {
 46    length_type const M = in.size();
 47
 48    index_type const ia = M % 2;  // adjustment to get source index
 49
 50    typename ArgumentBlock::value_type mid = in.get(M / 2);
 51
 52    for (index_type i = 0, ii = M / 2; i < M / 2; ++i, ++ii)
 53    {
 54      // Be careful to allow 'out' to alias 'in'
 55      typename ArgumentBlock::value_type tmp = in.get(ii + ia);
 56      out.put(ii, in.get(i));
 57      out.put(i, tmp);
 58    }
 59
 60    // if odd, fill in the last row/column(s)
 61    if (ia)
 62      out.put(M-1, mid);
 63  }
 64};
 65
 66/// Specialization for 2D swap
 67template <>
 68struct Freqswap_worker<2>
 69{
 70  template <typename ResultBlock, typename ArgumentBlock>
 71  static void apply(ResultBlock &out, ArgumentBlock const &in)
 72  {
 73    length_type const M = in.size(2, 0);
 74    length_type const N = in.size(2, 1);
 75
 76    index_type const ia = M % 2;  // adjustment to get source index
 77    index_type const ja = N % 2;
 78
 79    if (is_same_block(in, out))
 80    {
 81      // If in-place, use algorithm that trades O(1) temporary storage
 82      // for extra copies.
 83
 84      // First swap rows.
 85      for (index_type i=0; i < M; ++i)
 86      {
 87	typename ArgumentBlock::value_type mid = in.get(i, N / 2);
 88
 89	for (index_type j = 0, jj = N / 2; j < N / 2; ++j, ++jj)
 90	{
 91	  // Be careful to allow 'out' to alias 'in'
 92	  typename ArgumentBlock::value_type tmp = in.get(i, jj + ja);
 93	  out.put(i, jj, in.get(i, j));
 94	  out.put(i, j, tmp);
 95	}
 96
 97	// if odd, fill in the last row/column(s)
 98	if (ja) out.put(i, N-1, mid);
 99      }
100
101      // Second, swap columns.
102      for (index_type j=0; j < N; ++j)
103      {
104	typename ArgumentBlock::value_type mid = in.get(M / 2, j);
105
106	for (index_type i = 0, ii = M / 2; i < M / 2; ++i, ++ii)
107	{
108	  // Be careful to allow 'out' to alias 'in'
109	  typename ArgumentBlock::value_type tmp = in.get(ii + ia, j);
110	  out.put(ii, j, in.get(i, j));
111	  out.put(i,  j, tmp);
112	}
113
114	// if odd, fill in the last row/column(s)
115	if (ia) out.put(M-1, j, mid);
116      }
117    }
118    else
119    {
120      // equiv. to out[i,j] = in[(M/2 + i) mod M,(N/2 + i) mod N], 
121      //   where i = 0 --> M - 1 and j = 0 --> N - 1
122      for (index_type i = 0, ii = M / 2; i < M / 2; ++i, ++ii)
123      {
124	for (index_type j = 0, jj = N / 2; j < N / 2; ++j, ++jj)
125	{
126	  typename ArgumentBlock::value_type tmp = in.get(ii + ia, jj + ja);
127	  out.put(ii, jj, in.get(i, j));
128	  out.put(i, j, tmp);
129	  tmp = in.get(ii + ia, j);
130	  out.put(ii, j, in.get(i, jj + ja));
131	  out.put(i, jj, tmp);
132	}
133      }
134
135      // if odd, fill in the last row/column(s)
136      if (ia)
137      {
138	index_type i = M / 2;
139	index_type ii = M - 1;
140	for (index_type j = 0, jj = N / 2; j < N / 2; ++j, ++jj)
141	{
142	  out.put(ii, jj, in.get(i, j));
143	  out.put(ii,  j, in.get(i,jj + ja));
144	}
145      }
146      if (ja)
147      {
148	index_type j = N / 2;
149	index_type jj = N - 1;
150	for (index_type i = 0, ii = M / 2; i < M / 2; ++i, ++ii)
151	{
152	  out.put(ii, jj, in.get(i      , j));
153	  out.put( i, jj, in.get(ii + ia, j));
154	}
155      }
156      if (ia && ja) out.put(M - 1, N - 1, in.get(M / 2, N / 2));
157    }
158  }
159};
160} // namespace vsip::impl
161} // namespace vsip
162
163namespace vsip_csl
164{
165namespace dispatcher
166{
167#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
168template<>
169struct List<op::freqswap>
170{
171  typedef Make_type_list<be::generic>::type type;
172};
173#endif
174
175template <typename ResultBlock,
176	  typename ArgumentBlock>
177struct Evaluator<op::freqswap, be::generic,
178                 void(ResultBlock &, ArgumentBlock const &)>
179{
180  static bool const ct_valid = true;
181  static bool rt_valid(ResultBlock &, ArgumentBlock const &) { return true;}
182
183  static void exec(ResultBlock &result, ArgumentBlock const &argument)
184  {
185    vsip::impl::Freqswap_worker<ArgumentBlock::dim>::apply(result, argument);
186  }
187};
188} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
189} // namespace vsip_csl
190
191namespace vsip
192{
193namespace impl
194{
195
196template <typename Block>
197class Freqswap
198{
199  typedef typename View_block_storage<Block>::plain_type block_ref_type;
200
201public:
202  typedef typename Block::map_type map_type;
203  typedef typename Block::value_type result_type;
204  static dimension_type const dim = Block::dim;
205
206  typedef Freqswap<typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type> local_type;
207
208  Freqswap(block_ref_type in) : in_(in) {}
209
210  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const
211  {
212    assert(block_dim == dim);
213    return in_.size(block_dim, d);
214  }
215  length_type size() const { return in_.size();}
216  map_type const &map() const { return in_.map();}
217  Block const &arg() const { return in_;}
218
219  template <typename ResultBlock>
220  void apply(ResultBlock &out) const
221  {
222    namespace d = vsip_csl::dispatcher;
223#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
224    Evaluator<d::op::freqswap, Generic_tag,
225      void(ResultBlock&, Block const&)>::exec(out, in_);
226#else
227    vsip_csl::dispatch<d::op::freqswap, void, ResultBlock &, Block const &>(out, in_);
228#endif
229  }
230  local_type local() const { return local_type(get_local_block(in_));}
231
232private:
233  block_ref_type in_;
234};
235
236} // namespace impl
237
238/// Swaps halves of a vector, or quadrants of a matrix, to remap zero 
239/// frequencies from the origin to the middle.
240template <template <typename, typename> class const_View,
241          typename T,
242          typename B>
243typename 
244impl::lazy_of_view<const_View, impl::expr::Unary<impl::Freqswap, B> const>::type
245freqswap(const_View<T, B> in) VSIP_NOTHROW
246{
247  typedef impl::expr::Unary<impl::Freqswap, B> const block_type;
248  typedef typename impl::lazy_of_view<const_View, block_type>::type view_type;
249  impl::Freqswap<B> fs(in.block());
250  return view_type(block_type(fs));
251}
252
253} // namespace vsip
